title: Jan 10: {N} Working with SSH using Python

cells.data:
[Sending/receiving using scp over SSH using paramiko in python](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/250283/how-to-scp-in-python)
- Built on Paramiko
- Allows an easy API for transfer of files

[Installing Paramiko](http://www.paramiko.org/installing.html)

[Paramiko documentation](http://docs.paramiko.org/en/2.4/)

[Resource on SSH](https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/ssh-essentials-working-with-ssh-servers-clients-and-keys)
